name: Against Fate
description:
This is a story about a girl who ended up in a juvenile colony. There she will make new friends and learn about the clan of sorceresses who from time immemorial guarded the world. Subsequently, she will become one of them.

I did not have enough time to write a worthy ending and it turned out to be a long start, so it might seem that the story is not about sorceresses, but I will expand the story in the updates, so if you like it, stay in touch!

A couple of features:
5 original characters;
original story (hopefully);
sendings;
clumsy translation into English;
ginger song in the finale.

All characters and events are fictitious, all coincidences are random. I apologize for the inaccuracy of the translation into English, all claims should be sent to Google. Enjoy reading!
